posts.post_content:
100 different T205 cards with multiple backs.  Almost half of the T205 set!

Overall fair grade.  A few have staining, minor paper loss, writing on back but all are respectable for a starter set.

$2,500

Please contact me at [url]mikebrailey@yahoo.com[/url] for list of front/backs and all photos.

Mike

List of players and backs as requested by several:
